amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for choice based rental housing and homeownership assistance by $305 million in order to provide for an additional 50,000 vouchers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 as printed in the Congressional Record to authorize $305 million each year through FY 2002 in order to issue 50,000 new one-year choice-based vouchers, and to renew them each year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A020) Failed by voice vote.
